verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:23
verses.text: And of Naphtali he said, O Naphtali, satisfied with favour, and full with the blessing of the Lord: possess thou the west and the south.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:24
verses.text: And of Asher he said, Let Asher be blessed with children; let him be acceptable to his brethren, and let him dip his foot in oil.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:25
verses.text: Thy shoes shall be iron and brass; and as thy days, so shall thy strength be.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:26
verses.text: There is none like unto the God of Jeshurun, who rideth upon the heaven in thy help, and in his excellency on the sky.
